Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Complete expertise for all your financing needs

realEstate.title: Real Estate Loan
realEstate.description: Negotiation of the best rates for your primary, secondary, or rental residence.

insurance.title: Borrower Insurance
insurance.description: Save up to 50% on your loan insurance with the same guarantees.

creditConsolidation.title: Credit Consolidation
creditConsolidation.description: Consolidate your loans to reduce your monthly payments and simplify your budget.

professionalLoan.title: Professional Loan
professionalLoan.description: Financing for your premises, business assets, or professional equipment.

renegotiation.title: Rate Renegotiation
renegotiation.description: Take advantage of current rate drops to reduce the cost of your current loan.

support.title: Support
support.description: A dedicated advisor follows you from simulation to signing at the notary.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Your trusted partner for all your real estate projects

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.p1: For over 20 years, <highlight>AGM INVEST</highlight> has been accompanying individuals in realizing their real estate projects. Our team of experts guides you at every step to obtain the best financing.
Mission.p2: We negotiate for you with our banking partners and guarantee personalized support, from simulation to signing at the notary.

Values.title: Our Values
Values.v1: Total transparency on rates and fees
Values.v3: Responsiveness and availability of our advisors
Values.v4: Recognized expertise in the real estate market

t1.name: Sophie Martin
t1.content: Exceptional support from start to finish. Our advisor reassured us and found us a rate we would never have obtained alone.

t2.name: Thomas Dubois
t2.content: Speed, efficiency and professionalism. AGM INVEST allowed me to realize my investment project in record time.

t3.name: Marie & Pierre L.
t3.content: Thanks to the renegotiation of our loan, we are saving over €150 per month. Thanks to the whole team for their listening.

Network.title: Our strength? A solid network.
Network.description: As a specialized broker, we maintain close relationships with the largest national banks. This allows us to defend your file at the highest level and obtain derogatory conditions that you could not obtain alone in a branch.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why choose <highlight>AGM INVEST</highlight>?
WhyChooseUs.subtitle: In a complex market, having an expert ally by your side makes all the difference. We are not just intermediaries, we are the architects of your financing plan.

time.title: Save time
time.description: A single contact to query all banks. We handle all the paperwork for you.

conditions.title: Preferential conditions
conditions.description: Thanks to our business volume, we negotiate rates and conditions inaccessible to individuals.

expert.title: Expert Advice
expert.description: Optimized financial assembly, choice of insurance, credit smoothing... We optimize every detail.

support.title: Complete support
support.description: We are by your side from the first simulation to the release of funds.

History.title: Our History
History.subtitle: Nearly 20 years of expertise and innovation at the service of your projects.

m2006.title: Creation of AGM Invest
m2006.description: Foundation of the firm in Nantes with a vision: simplify access to credit for individuals.

m2012.title: Regional Expansion
m2012.description: Opening of 3 new agencies in the Great West and recruitment of 10 experts.

m2018.title: Professional Hub
m2018.description: Launch of the offer dedicated to businesses and real estate developers.

m2024.title: 100% Digitalization
m2024.description: Implementation of our online platform allowing real-time file tracking.

Process.title: Your financing in 4 steps
Process.subtitle: A clear and transparent process to realize your project with complete serenity.

s1.title: 1. Feasibility study
s1.description: Free analysis of your situation and definition of your financing envelope.

s2.title: 2. Research & Negotiation
s2.description: We question our partners to obtain the best market conditions.

s3.title: 3. Loan agreement
s3.description: Presentation of offers and selection of the best banking proposal.

s4.title: 4. Signature
s4.description: Support until the signature of the offer and the notarial deed.

Team.title: A team at your service
Team.subtitle: Passionate experts dedicated to the success of your project.

sophie.bio: Specialist in complex files and credit consolidation.
